Enlightening Item on the Duration of the Opposition after 1888. 


     The first difficulties with Brother _____ were created by the confusion that came into Battle Creek from the Minneapolis meeting. Two years of opposition were brought in, and at two general conferences a spirit prevailed among some of our leading men which was not inspired by God. Letter 183, 1899, p. 1. (To Brother Hyatt, November 9, 1899.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. January 26, 1955
